text.config.magia-config.title: Magia Edition Config
text.config.magia-config.option.doQuickE: Should explosives like End Crystals deal damage or not.
text.config.magia-config.option.PvPRange: Should Ranged Weapons used by Players deal damage or not.
text.config.magia-config.option.PvPExplo: Should Explosion Damage from Players deal damage or not.
